subject: Re: Northside Audiology  Website changes
preview: Thank you I have passed it onto our Practice Manager Natalie.  Kind regards,  Lesley  Receptionist    Simply better hearing.  Chatswood | Bella Vista | Neutral Bay | Gladesville  www.northsideaudiolog

full_threads.body:
Thank you I have passed it onto our Practice Manager Natalie.

Kind regards,

Lesley

Receptionist



Simply better hearing.

Chatswood | Bella Vista | Neutral Bay | Gladesville

www.northsideaudiology.com.au

Tel: 94196999 - 2/1-3 Havilah Street, Chatswood NSW 2067

Northside Audiology is a privately owned, independent company providing diagnostic audiology and rehabilitation services. We are not owned by, or aligned with, any hearing device manufacturer. We access hearing aids and implantable devices from a number of manufacturers based on our client's needs and preferences. Our audiologists do not receive any commission or incentive for fitting particular devices.

Hi Fiona, 

We don't manage your emails so I'm not 100% sure. Can you please contact your IT company? They should be able to advise.

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath

I'm not aware anyone has changed the password.

Can you please advise how we can reset it.

Many Thanks

Kind regards

Fiona

Senior Receptionist

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Natalie, 

It appears the password for info@northsideaudiology.com.au has been changed. Can you please send us the new one ASAP?

@heath I don't have access to their email/smtp account. Would you be able to check on your end if you have one?

chagpt lol
@heath, can you check if you have access to their email/SMTP account? I do not have access on my end.
@heath, I hope all is well with you. I wanted to inquire about the email/SMTP account in question. Would it be possible for you to check and see if you have access to it? I apologize for any inconvenience, as I do not currently have access on my end.
@joel could you please take a look at the issue?

Hi @ricaV2 for the email issue, I check on the settings it is already set to info@northsideaudiology.com.au, i tried to test using my wolfiq email in bcc but it is still not receiving the notification, can we ask assistance from joel or heath? maybe smtp or in the server settings has something to do with it?  I dont have access on smtp/server.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hi Rica,

Thanks so much for updating our website for us. We have decided to change the photo that I sent to you for the grommets. I will send you the updated photo once I receive it.

On another note, we have had a number of Doctors calling to say that although they fill in the on line referral form, we do not receive them. I have checked our junk and it is not going in there either.

Could you please look into this for me?

Many thanks in advance for your help, it is most appreciated.

Kind regards

Natalie

Practice Manager



Simply better hearing.

Chatswood | Bella Vista | Neutral Bay | Gladesville

www.northsideaudiology.com.au

Tel: 94196999 - Suite 2/1-3 Havilah St, Chatswood N.SW. 2067

Northside Audiology is a privately owned, independent company providing diagnostic audiology and rehabilitation services. We are not owned by, or aligned with, any hearing device manufacturer. We access hearing aids and implantable devices from a number of manufacturers based on our client's needs and preferences. Our audiologists do not receive any commission or incentive for fitting particular devices.

Hi Natalie, 

Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here are the links: 
https://northsideaudiology.com.au/product/waterproof-earbands-by-little-grommets/
https://northsideaudiology.com.au/ear-wax-removal-old/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

Hi @ricaV2 done on the following updates

Many thanks for updating the waterproof- ear-bands on our website. Could I please ask that you use the attached photo rather than the one that is currently there? -- ✅ Done
Url: https://northsideaudiology.com.au/product/waterproof-earbands-by-little-grommets/

In addition, the cost for wax removal has increased to $195. I would be very grateful if you could update our website to reflect this. -- ✅ Done 
Url: https://northsideaudiology.com.au/ear-wax-removal-old/

Time: +10mins

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hi Rica,

Many thanks for updating the waterproof- ear-bands on our website. Could I please ask that you use the attached photo rather than the one that is currently there?

In addition, the cost for wax removal has increased to $195. I would be very grateful if you could update our website to reflect this.



Kind regards

Natalie

Practice Manager
